channel.title: More MYSQL help
channel.description:
Hey i'm trying to get the login message from my database but i can't remember how i grab data...
ResultSet rs = stmt.executeQuery("SELECT * FROM logintext WHERE Line_01
i wants to get the text from line_01.
that is what i can remember.. ;(

item.title: More MYSQL help
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

I think this is what you’re asking for, but I don’t know anything about your database structure.

Result rs = stmt.executeQuery("SELECT * FROM `logintext`"); String message = rs.getString("Line_01");

Read full topic
